ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: Based on WP2 description involving characterization of polluted soils using physicochemical and omics methods.

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: Extracted from WP2 objectives, deliverables (D2.2, D2.3), and secondment knowledge transfer related to soil analysis.
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 1.0

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: Project start date is June 2024; all studies begin no earlier than project initiation.
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 1.0

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: UBU is the coordinating institution responsible for overall project management and communication.
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 1.0

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: Consortium partners are located in Spain (UBU, KEPLER), Slovenia (JSI, LIMNOS), and Netherlands (WUR). Sampling occurs at European polluted sites accessed by KEPLER and LIMNOS.
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 1.0

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: Design spans multiple WPs including site characterization (WP2), GEM modeling (WP3), and bioremediation testing (WP4).
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 0.9

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: UBU has greenhouse and climatic chambers; JSI and WUR have bioreactor and incubation facilities.
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 1.0

ground_truth_fields.evidence_location: Final milestone M48 is at month 48 (May 2028); studies conclude by then.
ground_truth_fields.notes: Extracted from FAIRiAgent output with confidence 1.0
